  index: "catalan_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      filter: {
        catalan_elision: {
          type: "elision",
          articles: ["d", "l", "m", "n", "s", "t"],
          articles_case: true,
        },
        catalan_stop: {
          type: "stop",
          stopwords: "_catalan_",
        },
        catalan_keywords: {
          type: "keyword_marker",
          keywords: ["example"],
        },
        catalan_stemmer: {
          type: "stemmer",
          language: "catalan",
        },
      },
      analyzer: {
        rebuilt_catalan: {
          tokenizer: "standard",
          filter: [
            "catalan_elision",
            "lowercase",
            "catalan_stop",
            "catalan_keywords",
            "catalan_stemmer",
          ],
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
